message.body: Hey. Did you get the email I sent with the lease agreement? I hope all is well and you are staying warm

Hey, I'm sorry I haven't gotten back to you! A friend passed away unexpectedly & I just got back from the funeral etc last night :( I have the email & will go over it today. You picked a good time to go south!!
I'm sorry to hear that! And yes I am very lucky to be in Florida right now. I'm sorry if its been too cold to ride. It looks like it is warming up though. And just FYI I mailed my board to Tanya

Ok, sure - that is one of the things I wanted to ask you about, where do I send the check? I'm catching up & will email any other questions too. I rode Louie a bunch before last week - he's been great. The past week has been arctic & I was going to ride today but it's snowing! The rest of the week looks better though.
Would it work if we both have Tanya $500 each month. And then I can let you know when he gets his feet done and I get a bill?
Yup, that sounds good! Board is due on the 1st, right?
